Record Loss Boundary Changes 1834--Marion County was created 25 January 1834 from Washington County. County seat: Lebanon [3] Parent County The county is named after "The Swamp Fox" Revolutionary War Brigadier General Francis Marion (c1732-1795).[2] Francis Marion.JPG History Marion County Courthouse 120 W Main Lebanon, KY 40033 Phone: 270.692.2651[1] Collection: County Court Houses, Flickr by Jimmy Emerson.
